mapper.select: select gender,count(*) cnt from customer c, book b where c.custid = b.custid and b.ticketid=#{ticketid} group by gender

select generation, count(*) num from (select custid,trunc((to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-substr(birth,0,4)+1)/10)*10 generation from customer) c, book b where c.custid=b.custid and b.ticketid=#{ticketid} group by generation
select ticketid from book where custid=#{custid}
select bookid, s.seatid, t.ticketid,img_fname, ticket_name,ticket_date, loc, seatname from book b, ticket t, seat s where t.ticketid=b.ticketid and b.seatid = s.seatid and custid=#{custid}
